boardgame.name: Apex Theropod Deck-Building Game
boardgame.description: Game Description:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Apex is a deck-building game, played solo or with up to 5 friends. You play as a prehistoric predator competing for territory and resources against other predators. Each playable species has a unique deck to master. Each deck has different strengths, weaknesses, and strategies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; creating a varied and constantly evolving experience._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your species must overcome a very brutal environment including harsh climate changes, disease, attacks from predators, grievous wounds, infections, and deadly prey. The game incorporates many dinosaurs that behave in their own distinct way. The goal of the game is to endure the environment, build up the population and evolve your species, and become the apex predator._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Base Game includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 17_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Dinosaur size box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 525 cards + 20 Card Dividers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 24_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 16_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Hunting Grounds game board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Six 16_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 9_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Nesting Grounds mats_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 80mm T.rex miniature Player Marker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 40pg Rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; 5 Foam Blocks to protect cards and fill empty spaces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Includes 7 Playable Apex Decks:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Acrocanthosaurus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Carnotaurus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Giganotosaurus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Spinosaurus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Tyrannosaurus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Utahraptor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Velociraptor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 525 cards includes 7 playable Apex Decks, 22 diverse animals to hunt, 11 dangerous carnivores, 8 opposing Boss cards with Minions (acts as artificial players for solo play), 11 environmental effects, 5 genetic evolution types, and 3 grievous wound types._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Previous Version Published (NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH BASE GAME):_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Exotic Predators Limited Edition (see separate entry for details)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note to fans:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The dinosaurs and events in Apex are not 100% based on fact. Apex is a mix of old and new dinosaur culture and some things were just changed to enjoy the game more. Please forgive us for any inaccuracies you find in Apex and it is not designed to educate._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Beta Tester list:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Anthony Sato, Erich Hartsock, Keith Neemann, Ramon Wallace, Sean Donaldson, Dennis Lenusters, Jeremy Mohler, Mike Paschal, Jonathan Venezian, Stephen Hill, Chris Gunning, Cody Bridges, Kevin, Christopher Crowell, Thomas Prentice, Baldur, Matthew, Nathaniel Graham, Chris Pienta, Christopher Lambson, Joseph Avery, David Schreiber, Tyler Howsare, Matthew Sauerbrunn, Denis Durand, Daniel Goldman, Aaron, Teresa Phillips, Collin Shorette, NVS Gameplays, Gergorian, Scott Lenet, Adherbal Junior, Corey Punko, Scott Sexton, Cyn, Matt Schock, Kyle Collins, Jack, Tom Hoefle, Jason Lesovoy, Kristian, Ekky-Bear, Ryan Mrochuk, Deon Beswick, Tim Long, Chen Weiyu, Brandon Lane, Nicholas Miesmer, Nicholas Rusak, Jacob Carter, Gabriel Marquez, James Dundas, S Williams, Tremane Barclay, George Bracy, Nathaniel Walter, Jason Wright, Chris Murphy, and all other testers!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Microbadges_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Apex Theropod fan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; - Apex Theropod Deck-Building Game fan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Some cards are sleeved.

Played with 3-4 times so in excellent condition. This is the KS Exotic Predators Ltd edition. I have printed out the retail edition of the rulebook and made some additional divider cards to make sorting easier. From a smoke and pet-free home and will be carefully packed. I will be at UK Games Expo 2015 so a handover could be done.

Opened, but unplayed. (The price is high, because I have imported it and I also had to pay taxes on it (my total cost was about 150$)). Feel free to message me if you have any questions. Shipping: Please ask for the details! Shipping depends on destination and total weight. (Germany 5,99€ DHL, most EU countries 16€). I will accept payment via Paypal (if you pay the fees / money to friends) or Bank Transfer.
Unwrapped the cards, have not played. Exotic Predators Limited Edition Shipping USPS $10.00 could be slightly less if on the West Coast. Any questions please ask. non-smoker
Excellent condition. Buyer pays shipping from 80903, please message with requested service to figure out exact pricing.

Exotic Predators Limited edition (from Kickstarter) with exclusive T. Rex vs Spinosaurus card back, and exclusive Sarcosuchus and Quetzalcoatlus classes card decks. ATTENTION: This the the game from the 1st Kickstarter. WILL ALSO CONSIDER A TRADE -- contact me. Cards have been sorted, but game was never played.

Exotic Predators Limited edition (from Kickstarter) with exclusive T. Rex vs Spinosaurus card back, and exclusive Sarcosuchus and Quetzalcoatlus classes card decks. ATTENTION: This the the game from the 1st Kickstarter. WILL ALSO CONSIDER A TRADE -- contact me. Cards have been sorted AND SLEEVED, but game has never been played.
KS in Shrink
KS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Exotic Predators_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Limited Edition. Cards not in shrink, but in excellent, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition.

Complete Tier Kickstarter Edition includes: -All 4 expansion decks -Base game set -All unlocked stretch goals Notable stretch goals include: -The stomping dead expansion deck -Nesting grounds mat -and 7 more unlocked stretch goals The price ($69.99) is a $10 discount compared to the Kickstarter price of $80. The game will ship via FedEx Ground with tracking and insurance for a flat $10 to continental US addresses, which is a $12 discount compared to the Kickstarter shipping price of $22. If you are interested in shipping to a military base, outside the United States, or to Hawaii or Alaska, please contact me first.
Beta version. Cards sleeved. PDF rulebook. Excellent condition throughout.
2nd edition - Includes 4 expansion packs: - Suchomimus - Therizinosaurus - Stomping Grounds = Saurophaganax Shipping will be $18 via USPS Priority Mail

Played twice. Excellent condition.

Mint; cards/etc. still in orig shrink-wrap...this post ALSO INCLUDES three (3) dinosaurs expansions/decks (also unopened)(Therizinosaurus, Saurophaganax and Suchomimus)! s/h will be $14.99 for all 4...(add $10 for west coast)

Includes the Suchomimus and Stomping Grounds Expansions. They are both still in shrink. I will pay the shipping to the Continental US.

Unplayed, just unwrapped and all cards sleeved. This includes the Expansions: Suchomimus Expansion Deck Therizinosaurus Expansion Deck Saurophaganax Expansion Deck (all of the above are also unplayed and sleeved.) Payment is possible via Paypal or bank transfer (IBAN/BIC). If paypal is chosen as an option, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll add 4,00€ to cover the fees. Shipping is 9,00€ to Germany and 22,00€ to the EU. Contact me for different shipping locations.

The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Like New_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition is for the condition of the box, cards and expansions. This comes with the base game and the following four expansion packs: (1) Saurophaganax Expansion Deck; (2) Stomping Grounds Expansion Deck; (3) Suchomimus Expansion Deck; and (4) Therizinosaurus Expansion Deck. The cards of the base game and the expansions packs are still in shrink. The expansion packs will come inside the base box. The shrink wrap of the base game was removed to inspect the contents of the box. Like many, the T-Rex resin mini was broken in transit from the distributor. I have since glued it. Also note that the box is large and doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fit into a USPS flat rate box. This game ships from 84098.

KS (both times) - all put together in base box - never got around to playing - now I have to sell * Base game * MEGALODON EXPANSION * Stomping Grounds Exp * Saurophaganax Exp * Therizinosaurus Exp Will ship via USPS flat rate box.

Never played, broken and repaired mini. Expansion decks (unopened) included: --Saurophaganax --Stomping Grounds --Suchomimus --Therizinosaurus Player mats have had the corners rounded. [imageid=3924966medium] If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re considering purchasing this realize it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a large, heavy box. I have not weighed it, but the version listing indicates 7 lbs., so figure on 9 lbs. shipping weight with box and packing materials included.

RESERVED FOR AUCTION WINNER Includes: Exotic Predators Expansion Decks (Quetzalcoatlus _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Sarcosuchus Expansion Decks) Megalodon Deck Saurophaganax Deck Therizinosaurus Deck Suchomimus Deck Stomping Grounds Expansion (including cards for the exotic predators decks) Stomping Dead deck and other KS exclusives
Starting player dinosaur figure is glued back together (its fragile) box top has a crease. otherwise everything is in very good condition

Please be aware, this is an incomplete set. There are cards missing from this set, but what remains makes the game still perfectly playable as a solo game. This was due to buying a sealed copy that was missing those cards in itself (read BGG, there were MANY problems with the KSs being sent out and the company making it is now long gone) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling due to the fact I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve sourced another copy that had the whole set of cards. All cards are sleeved, and the cards that are missing are as follows: ALL Alpha cards for player decks (not needed for solo, photo 1) 3 Virus cards (5 remaining in box) 15 Flesh Wounds (25 remaining in box) 6 Severe Trauma (10 remaining in box) For a solo game, you only need (Photo 2) 3 Virus 6 Severe Trauma 15 Flesh Wounds In addition to this, the following are missing 2 Dynamic Vitality 1 Acute Alertness 1 Defensive Stance 3 Alertness Missing these has very little impact on the game Weight is 2.5 kilos UK Postage with MyHermes £5 UK Royal Mail £9 Europe, approx £16, can confirm for each country

Excellent condition; dinosaur statue is intact. Please geekmail if you want a shipping quote. This is a large game (7 lbs, possibly oversize surcharge) and will not ship flat rate. Local pickup is available from NYC, North NJ, or possibly Newark DE.
The box is taped from splitting but is not structurally compromised. The 1st player token is broken (apparently very common) but virtually unnecessary for gameplay.

Includes the following expansions: Stomping Grounds Saurophaganaz Suchomimus Therizinosaurus All original components, including instructions and T-Rex miniature, present and in great condition. All cards sleeved and never played without sleeves. Contact me first for shipping because this thing is a beast. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll work with you to get the best possible shipping price.
For user Mikegoesgeek only.

Still in shrink wrap. Also Stomping Grounds available as separate sale. Contact me for discount on both!

Played this twice. Love the cards. Love the idea. Just can’t get into it. Everything in great shape. Includes 4 expansion packs. Never used. Saurophaganax. Stomping grounds. Suchomimus. Therizinosaurus. Shipping free.
Played once. Box and cards in excellent shape. Many of the cards still shrink-wrapped.

Very good condition with one exception. The big start player T. Rex figure came with part of his tail snapped off. Since the company was already kaput by the time I bought the game, there was no way to get a replacement. This obviously has no effect on the game, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s just a big first player marker. The cards are all in very good condition as is the box. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a big, non-standard box that won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fit in a flat-rate shipping box. Shipping will be about 6 lbs from 94124, USPS Priority.

Includes: Exotic Predators (cards, not box or rules) Stomping Grounds Exp Saurophaganax Exp Therizinosaurus Exp Megalodon Exp All 2nd ed kickstarter stretchgoals 2nd ed box, rules, gameboard and player boards T-Rex miniature The Booster Deck and Exotic Predators Add-On that should be included from the kickstarter is missing, all those cards are currently replaced by printed proxies. The Booster deck and Exotic Predators Add-On will be delivered eventually according to the current owner of the game and is included in the package price. Buyer pays P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P

Second edition with the following expansions: Saurophaganax Therizinosaurus Suchomimus Stomping Grounds All components are in great shape, with the exception of the T-Rex first player marker, which broke and is thus not included. Expansions are mixed into base game, boxes not included. Shipping will be actual cost.
2nd Kickstarter edition. Includes the 3 bonus packs.
